author: Elisha Fieldstadt
title: Walmart sold enough toilet paper in 5 days for every American to have one roll, CEO says
description: Walmart CEO Doug McMillon said Friday on TODAY that stores around the country have sold enough toilet paper in five days for every American to have their own roll.
content:
Walmart sold enough toilet paper in 5 days for every American to have one roll, CEO says
Walmart sold enough toilet paper in five days for every American to have their own roll, a statistic cited by the retail giant's CEO in saying that shoppers should buy o… [+7500 chars]
